title: tube-tags
description: A Chrome extension to bookmark the timestamps of your YouTube videos.

title: Ethos - a MERN blog website
description: A MERN based blog website made as a submission to Web Tech course at my university.

title: AI Image Generator
description: A basic AI image generator made by leveraging OpenAI's API

title: Spell Checker
description: A DSA project written in C, which validates the spellings of the word/sentence input and allows user to add a new word to the database. Implemented using trie as the principle DS.

title: Text-based adventure game
description: A game built in python which simulates an escape room adventure.

title: English to Kannada translator
description: An AI agent that takes English text and translates it to the Kannada language. Built using illa.ai
